name: oski-complete-suite
description: Complete Oski application suite with PromptGen and OSCE Video Grader

scripts.start:osce: cd osce-video-grader && echo 'Starting OSCE Video Grader...' && cd web && npm run dev -- --port 3001
scripts.install:all: npm run install:promptgen && npm run install:osce
scripts.install:promptgen: cd rubrics-to-prompts/frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: rm -rf logs && rm -rf rubrics-to-prompts/frontend/node_modules && rm -rf rubrics-to-prompts/backend/venv && rm -rf osce-video-grader/web/node_modules
scripts.health: curl -s http://localhost:3000 && curl -s http://localhost:8000/docs && curl -s http://localhost:3001 && curl -s http://localhost:8001/docs

author: Sahaj Satani & Aarash Zakeri
